flawed_nl_solution:
The gluten-free cupcakes are 80 / 2 = <<80/2=40>>40.
The vegan cupcakes with gluten are 24 / 2 = <<24/2=21>>21.
The non-vegan cupcakes with gluten are 40 - 21 = <<40-21=19>>19.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
